OCD.name: AccessToken
OCD.description: Facebook requires that users authenticate before using the API. In order to authenticate, please login, review and accept the permissions Facebook requires. Once you log in and accept the permissions, Facebook will generate an access token for you on a new page. Copy that token and paste it in the dialog box when you run other Facebook algorithms.

OCD.name: FacebookFriendsData
OCD.description: Gather name, user ID, latest update, gender, current location, hometown, birth date, interests, religion, political views, relationship status, and attended events of your Facebook connections. Obtain a key from the Access Token plugin to continue. Also, please review the terms and conditions for the Facebook API here: https://developers.facebook.com/policy

AD.name: Access Token
AD.description: Run the Facebook Access Token plugin. After following the steps, copy/paste the result.

OCD.name: MutualFriends
OCD.description: Create a friendship network of your Facebook connections. Obtain a key from the Access Token plugin to continue. Also, please review the terms and conditions for the Facebook API here: https://developers.facebook.com/policy

AD.name: Access Token
AD.description: Run the Facebook Access Token plugin. After following the steps, copy/paste the result.
